sect4.title: lilo
sect4.para: lilo installs the Linux boot loader which is used to start a Linux system.

sect4.title: mkrescue
sect4.para: mkrescue makes a bootable rescue floppy using the existing kernel and any initial ramdisk.

sect4.title: keytab-lilo.pl
sect4.para: keytab-lilo.pl compiles keytable definitions into a format which lilo can use in order to set the keyboard type during boot.
